review: I’ve been there to Ojas on two different occasions & met Dr. Manoj.. He is a true professional, very kind & understanding…he addresses & analyses our issues in details & advise specific treatments accordingly…highly recommend him for all ortho issues

Visited Manoj doctor for my rotator cuff muscle tear. Doctor examined in detail and provided medications. His diagnosis and treatment was excellent and gave us more confidence. Excellent team of doctors at Ojas. They are more of service mind and I wish the entire team to continue the same. Extremely satisfied with the hospital. Thank you team.

I consulted Dr.Manoj for my lower back pain. He was quick to identify my issue and his diagnosis was spot on. His treatment has improved my quality of life a lot. He is very approachable and he boosts our confidence. I would recommend him.
